code: import{AvCheckbox,AvCheckboxGroup,AvField}from"availity-reactstrap-validation";import{Accordion}from"react-bootstrap";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{Col,Row}from"reactstrap";import parse from"html-react-parser";import{CLIENT_AGREEMENT,IB_AGREEMENT,COUNTRY_REGULATIONS,E_SIGNATURE}from"declarations";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const purpose=["Improving source of Income","Utilizing investment opportunities","Asset perservation","Planning for the future","Asset development"];const Declerations=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const{clientData}=useSelector(state=>state.Profile);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Accordion.Item,{eventKey:"3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Accordion.Header,{children:t("Declerations")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Accordion.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:t("Investment Purpose")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"my-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AvCheckboxGroup,{name:"corporateInfo.purpose",required:true,children:purpose.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AvCheckbox,{label:item,value:item},index))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"",children:t("By Clicking Submit, you hereby confirm and agree to the following:")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{md:12,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"mt-0 mb-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AvField,{name:"agreement",label:clientData.isClient?parse(CLIENT_AGREEMENT):parse(IB_AGREEMENT),type:"checkbox",errorMessage:t("Please check the agreement"),validate:{required:{value:true}}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AvField,{name:"regulations",label:t(COUNTRY_REGULATIONS),type:"checkbox",errorMessage:t("Please check the agreement"),validate:{required:{value:true}}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AvField,{name:"signature",label:t(E_SIGNATURE),type:"checkbox",errorMessage:t("Please check the agreement"),validate:{required:{value:true}}})]})]})]})]});};export default Declerations;
